archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca.1000 diplomas and certificates (7 oversize boxes), chiefly from the University of Virginia.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Recipient's name], Diplomas Collection, Accession #[ ], Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of ca.1000 diplomas and certificates, chiefly from the University of Virginia.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged alphabetically by degree recipient's surname and is subarranged in reverse chronological order.
